err.invalid_code: Invalid password reset code. Please check the last reset code we sent you.

signup.title: Sign up to Iroco
signup.redirection: Once you have completed and submitted the form, you will be redirected to the website of GoCardless, our payment provider, in order to proceed with the subscription by SEPA mandate. Your subscription will transit through the bank account of our payment provider: therefore, it is their bank details that will appear as the creditor on your bank statement.

terms.title: By clicking on the button above, you agree to our

errors.invalid_domain_name: Domain name should be of the form domain.extension
errors.unavailable_email: The email {email} is not available. Try this : {emails}
errors.pass_less_than_8: The password should have at least 8 characters.
errors.pass_has_uppercase_letter: The password must have at least one uppercase letter.
errors.pass_has_lowercase_letter: The password must have at least one lowercase letter.
errors.pass_has_number: The password must have at least one number.
errors.pass_has_special_char: The password must have at least one special character.

home.title: Welcome

role.0: Your account is not activated yet. To activate your account, go to your inbox and click the activation link that was sent to you.
role.1: Your account is in free trial period

home.unsubscribe: You can close your iroco account by clicking on this link.

activate.title: Warning: your account is not yet activated
activate.text:
In order for your email account to work properly, you must:
  1. Configure your email client
  2. In your inbox, click on the activation link that was sent to you by email
